basics.name: Pawan Kumar
basics.label: Full Stack Web Developer
basics.summary: I am an highly active individual with over 3 years of experience in Web Development. I am proficient in Web Technologies like HTML, CSS, LESS, JS, jQuery, React.js, Angular.js, Node.js, Restful Services etc.., Familiar tools include: Git, Jira, SVN. Also, I come with crazy Debugging skills and passion to write clean, modular, reusable and extensible code.

work.summary: Echidna is a service based company which is into eCommerce(B2C and B2B) application development in platforms such as Kibo, Magento, OCC..;
highlights: Technologies Used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Angular.js, React.js, Redux, Backbone.js,Hypr templating engine,  LESS, ECMAScript 2015 and Node
Worked with and Led a team to build beautiful, performing user friendly  sites and deploy them into production environments
Came up with lots of ideas, POCs and implementations for working around the framework to meet client requirements
Following Agile methodology for the development and deployment(Client Interactions and Development follow ups on JIRA - epics, stories and defects.)
Technologies Used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Angular.js, PHP, Wordpress
Leading a team working on web development, SEO On page & Off page activities and Testing. Brainstorming and coming up with the tasks/set of activities for the team members.
Actively Involved in the complete development cycle, from Design documentation, value proposition, Defining DB structure, Backend services, frontend UI/Ux and Unit testing.
Building web services for the Lumosâ€™ cross platform mobile applications  StepUp and SchoolUp. Built app to compute and display student performance reports using web services via ajax.
Taught Mathematics for 10th CBSE and ICSE Board Students; average ratings of 4.8 out of 5.0.
